CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 4, 1951, pg. 22, reads: "'Showboat' Stars Visit - Bertha Powell, who plays the part of 'Queenie' and La Vern [LeVern] Hutcherson, baritone, who plays the role of 'Joe' in next week's Civic Light Opera presentation of 'Showboat' at Pitt Stadium, recently visited at the home of Mrs. Eunice Cook. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Eunice Cook, actor LeVern Hutcherson, and actor Bertha Powell posed with arms around each other in yard of Cook home
